SENT.plain: Indium-111 leukocyte imaging is a reliable procedure for detecting abscesses
Problems such as cell clumping can occur before injection, thus altering the normal distribution
Furthermore, accumulation of the labeled leukocytes in the colon, brain infarcts, and accessory spleens has been observed
Thus, these physiologic and pathologic conditions other than abscesses must be borne in mind to avoid false-positive diagnoses of abscess
